price: Quien luche [contra sus pasiones] será en beneficio propio. Dios no tiene necesidad de las cosas creadas.
arabic: وَمَن جَٰهَدَ فَإِنَّمَا يُجَٰهِدُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِيٌّ عَنِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: waman jāhada fa-innamā yujāhidu linafsihi inna al-laha laghaniyyun ʿani al-ʿālamīna
